<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
<package format="1" xmlns="https://wiki.freecad.org/Package_Metadata">
  <name>AddFC Workbench</name>
  <description>Additional tools for FreeCAD.</description>
  <version>1.9.1</version>
  <date>2025-08-20</date>
  <maintainer email="nn19051990@gmail.com">Golodnikov Sergey</maintainer>
  <author email="nn19051990@gmail.com">Golodnikov Sergey</author>
  <license file="LICENSE">LGPL-2.1-or-later</license>
  <url type="repository" branch="main">https://github.com/GS90/addFC</url>
  <url type="readme">https://github.com/GS90/addFC/blob/main/README.md</url>
  <url type="documentation">https://github.com/GS90/addFC/blob/main/repo/doc</url>
  <icon>repo/icon/workbench.svg</icon>
  <content>
    <workbench>
      <classname>AddFC</classname>
      <subdirectory>./</subdirectory>
      <freecadmin>0.20.2</freecadmin>
      <!-- dependencies -->
      <depend optional="true" type="addon">sheetmetal</depend>
      <depend optional="true" type="python">numpy</depend>
      <depend optional="true" type="python">ezdxf</depend>
      <!-- tags -->
      <tag>bom</tag>
      <tag>library</tag>
      <tag>exploded</tag>
      <tag>sheetmetal</tag>
    </workbench>
  </content>
</package>

<!-- NOTE: The Addon Manager still uses the original xmlns entry so that older versions of FreeCAD can upgrade
 to the newest Addon Manager. This can be changed when FreeCAD v1.0 is no longer supported. -->
<package format="1" xmlns="https://wiki.freecad.org/Package_Metadata">
    <name>Addon Manager</name>
    <description>Tool to install workbenches, macros, themes, etc.</description>
    <icon>Resources/icons/addon_manager.svg</icon>
    <version>2025.08.23</version>
    <date>2025-08-23</date>
    <maintainer email='chennes@freecad.org'>Chris Hennes</maintainer>
    <author email = 'yorik@uncreated.net'>Yorik van Havre</author>
    <author>Jonathan Wiedemann</author>
    <author>Kurt Kremitzki</author>
    <license file="LICENSE">LGPL-2.1-or-later</license>
    <url type='repository' branch='main'>https://github.com/FreeCAD/AddonManager</url>
    <url type='bugtracker'>https://github.com/FreeCAD/AddonManager/issues</url>
    <url type='readme'>https://github.com/FreeCAD/AddonManager/blob/main/README.md</url>

    <content>
        <workbench>
            <!-- Even though the Addon Manager is not a workbench, it declares itself as one so that versions of
            FreeCAD prior to 1.1 can see the InitGui.py file and run it. -->
            <name>AddonManager</name>
            <subdirectory>./</subdirectory>
        </workbench>
    </content>
</package>

<package format="1" xmlns="https://wiki.freecad.org/Package_Metadata">

  <name>CamScripts</name>

  <version>V0.0.5  2024/09/25</version>

  <maintainer email="spanner888@usabledevices.com">spanner888</maintainer>

  <url type="readme">https://github.com/spanner888/CamScripts.git/raw/main/README.md</url>

  <content>
    <workbench>
      <name>CamScripts</name>
      <description>Automation of ToolBit import and scripted creation, with very flexible naming rules.
        Automation of every step of the CAM process, from tool creation to G-code generation.
        Demonstrate speeds and feeds calculations using the newly released Machinability Materials.
        Additional demonstration of Materials Machinability model to provide data for Speeds and Feeds,
        including exploring of fz (chipload) tables.</description>
      <freecadmin>0.22.0</freecadmin>
      <tag>CAM</tag>
      <tag>Import</tag>
      <tag>CSV</tag>
      <tag>Library</tag>
      <tag>ToolBits</tag>
      <tag>Job</tag>
      <tag>Operations</tag>
      <tag>Library</tag>
      <tag>ToolControllers</tag>
      <tag>Materials</tag>
      <tag>Calculate</tag>
      <tag>Speeds</tag>
      <tag>Feeds</tag>
      <tag>Sanity</tag>
      <tag>Report</tag>
      <tag>Gcode</tag>
    </workbench>
    <macro>
      <name>CamScripts CSV Import</name>
      <description>CSV bulk Import with naming rules</description>
      <subdirectory>./</subdirectory>
      <file>script_run_macros/CamScripts_1CSV_Import.FCMacro</file>
    </macro>
    <macro>
      <name>CamScripts Add Tool Bits</name>
      <description>Create ranges of ToolBits with naming rules</description>
      <subdirectory>./</subdirectory>
      <file>script_run_macros/CamScripts_2TbAddExample.FCMacro</file>
    </macro>
    <macro>
      <name>CamScripts Full Process Example</name>
      <description>Create and recreate every step of the CAM process, from tool creation to G-code generation</description>
      <subdirectory>./</subdirectory>
      <file>script_run_macros/CamScripts_3FullProcessExample.FCMacro</file>
    </macro>
    <macro>
      <name>READMEs</name>
      <description>Readmes and also find naming rules and CSV files</description>
      <subdirectory>./</subdirectory>
      <file>script_run_macros/CamScripts_4READMEs.FCMacro</file>
    </macro>
    <macro>
      <name>SetupCustomToolShapes</name>
      <description></description>
      <subdirectory>./</subdirectory>
      <file>script_run_macros/CamScripts_5Setup_CustomToolShapes.FCMacro</file>
    </macro>
    <macro>
      <name>SetupCustomMaterialCfg</name>
      <description></description>
      <subdirectory>./</subdirectory>
      <file>script_run_macros/CamScripts_6Setup_CustomMaterialCfg.FCMacro</file>
    </macro>
  </content>

</package>
